docs.lead_paragraph: INTERNATIONAL A3-16 Bush Criticizes Israel For West Bank Offensive President Bush rebuked Israel for its military operations against Palestinians in the West Bank, saying the actions of the Sharon government were ''not helpful'' and suggesting that they went beyond self-defense. A1 Israel's defense minister threatened to resign over the extent of the army's continuing invasion of Ramallah. A15

headline.main: Trading Places; Effects of Smoking? More Than 'Annoying'

docs.abstract: David Vassar letter on February 24 item on Dalton students' reaction to proposed cigarette tax describes health problems associated with smoking
docs.lead_paragraph: To the Editor: Re ''New Cigarette Tax? Young Smokers Just Shrug'' (Feb. 24): I wonder if the Dalton student who will find the proposed tax ''just annoying'' will find prematurely aged skin 10 years hence ''annoying,'' compromised cardiopulmonary function 20 years hence ''annoying'' and a highly probable experience with emphysema, stroke or lung cancer ''annoying.'' That Dalton education won't halt the ravages of nicotine addiction, an equal-opportunity killer.
